languages.text: "Ты так{mf|ой|ая} же изменни{mf|к|ца}, как и Теодора! Вашей династии давно пора преподать урок покорности".
"You are a traitor, just like Theodora! Your dynasty has long since needed a lesson in obedience."
languages.original_text: "Ты так{mf|ой|ая} же изменни{mf|к|ца}, как и Теодора! Вашей династии давно пора преподать урок покорности".

traits.locale_text: "You are a traitor just like Theodora! Your dynasty has long been in need of a lesson in obedience."
traits.speaker: Chorda

traits.locale_text: "You are a traitor just like Theodora! Your dynasty has long been in need of a lesson in obedience."

traits.locale_text: "You are a traitor, just like Theodora! Your dynasty has long since needed a lesson in obedience."
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: “你和西奥多拉一样都是叛徒！你的王朝早该好好学学如何服从帝国了！”
languages.original_text: "You are a traitor, just like Theodora! Your dynasty has long since needed a lesson in obedience."

traits.locale_text: “你和西奥多拉一样都是叛徒！你的王朝早该好好学学如何服从帝国了！”
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: 「お前はシオドーラと同じ裏切り者だ！お前の王朝は、服従の教えを必要とするようになって久しい」
languages.original_text: "You are a traitor, just like Theodora! Your dynasty has long since needed a lesson in obedience."

traits.locale_text: 「お前はシオドーラと同じ裏切り者だ！お前の王朝は、服従の教えを必要とするようになって久しい」
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: «¡Es un traidor, igual que Theodora! Su dinastía necesita desde hace tiempo una lección de obediencia».
languages.original_text: "You are a traitor, just like Theodora! Your dynasty has long since needed a lesson in obedience."

traits.locale_text: «¡Es un traidor, igual que Theodora! Su dinastía necesita desde hace tiempo una lección de obediencia».
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: "Ihr seid ein Verräter, genau wie Theodora! Eure Dynastie bedarf schon sehr lange einer Lektion in Gehorsam."
languages.original_text: "You are a traitor, just like Theodora! Your dynasty has long since needed a lesson in obedience."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr seid ein Verräter, genau wie Theodora! Eure Dynastie bedarf schon sehr lange einer Lektion in Gehorsam."
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: « Vous êtes {mf|un traître|une traîtresse}, comme Théodora ! Votre dynastie a depuis longtemps besoin d'une bonne leçon d'obéissance. »
languages.original_text: "You are a traitor, just like Theodora! Your dynasty has long since needed a lesson in obedience."

traits.locale_text: « Vous êtes {mf|un traître|une traîtresse}, comme Théodora ! Votre dynastie a depuis longtemps besoin d'une bonne leçon d'obéissance. »
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: "Sen bir hainsin. Tıpkı Theodora gibi! Hanedanlığının itaat konusunda bir ders alma zamanı geldi de geçiyor bile."
languages.original_text: "You are a traitor, just like Theodora! Your dynasty has long since needed a lesson in obedience."

traits.locale_text: "Sen bir hainsin. Tıpkı Theodora gibi! Hanedanlığının itaat konusunda bir ders alma zamanı geldi de geçiyor bile."
traits.speaker: Chorda
